Description: Saudi Vitrified Clay Pipes (known as: SVCP) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since May 2007. SVCP operates within the Capital Goods sector focusing on Industrial Machinery. SVCP is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in February 1978.
